name: BeeKind
description:
BeeKind is a two player group project for a university game jam.

Based on the theme of values and aspirations:

1. Peace

2. To earn lots of money

3. To live in the country side

4. Settle with family

5. Take my dad to space

Player 1 is the bee keeper, they must water the plants using the pink watering cans. Once the honey has been produced in the hives they can then take the honey to the stand to sell!

Player 2 is the bee, when the flowers glow bright yellow they must take the flower to the hive to produce honey!

Controls:

P1: WASD

P2: Arrow Keys

Enjoy!!
